OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Commands are only active when stream is live

QueueOpen.label: Queue open
QueueOpen.tooltip: Add level command is only active when queue is open

command_info.label: Command Name (Info)
command_info.tooltip: Command to get info about SMM2 Level Queue Bot

command_add.label: Command Name (Add level)
command_add.tooltip: Command to add a level to queue

command_list.label: Command Name (Levels list)
command_list.tooltip: Command to list all levels in queue

command_position.label: Command Name (Position on list)
command_position.tooltip: Command to show all the queue positions the user has levels in

command_current_level.label: Command Name (Current level)
command_current_level.tooltip: Command to show current level being played, if any

command_next_level.label: Command Name (Next level)
command_next_level.tooltip: Command to show next level in queue, if any

command_win_level.label: Command Name (Win level)
command_win_level.tooltip: Command to jump to next level adding a win to the counter

command_skip_level.label: Command Name (Skip level)
command_skip_level.tooltip: Command to jump to next level adding a skip to counter

command_delete_level.label: Command Name (Delete level)
command_delete_level.tooltip: Command to jump to next level without modifying scores

PermissionBase.label: Permission level (Basic commands)
PermissionBase.tooltip: Set the permission level for add, list, currentlevel, nextlevel, etc.

PermissionInfoBase.label: Permission level info (Basic commands)
PermissionInfoBase.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for base permission

PermissionAdvanced.label: Permission level (Adv. commands)
PermissionAdvanced.tooltip: Set the permission level for win or skip commands

PermissionInfoAdvanced.label: Permission level info (Adv. commands)
PermissionInfoAdvanced.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for advanced permission

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

omit_duplicated_levels.label: Omit duplicated levels
omit_duplicated_levels.tooltip: Omit levels that are currently on queue

OnDuplicatedLevel.value: @{0} Level {1} is already on queue. Duplicated levels are omitted
OnDuplicatedLevel.label: Duplicated level specified response
OnDuplicatedLevel.tooltip:
The message the bot will display when trying to add a duplicated level to queue. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = level code

is_queue_limited.label: Enable queue limit
is_queue_limited.tooltip: Use max levels parameter to limit max levels queued

queue_length.label: Max levels on queue
queue_length.tooltip: Max levels number that can exist in queue

OnQueueLimitReached.value: @{0} Level queue is full (Max {1} levels). Wait till a slot is free to add your level
OnQueueLimitReached.label: Queue limit reached response
OnQueueLimitReached.tooltip:
The message the bot will display when the queue limit is reached. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = queue length

is_user_limited.label: Enable user limit
is_user_limited.tooltip: Use max levels by user parameter to limit user

max_levels_by_user.label: Max levels by user
max_levels_by_user.tooltip: Max levels number that can exist in queue

OnMaxLevelsByUserReached.value: @{0} You have reached max levels by user ({1}), wait till one of your levels is completed to add another one
OnMaxLevelsByUserReached.label: User Max levels reached response
OnMaxLevelsByUserReached.tooltip:
The message the bot will display when max levels by user is reached. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = max levels by user

CooldownInfo.label: Info Global Cooldown (seconds)
CooldownInfo.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds for info command.

UserCooldownInfo.label: Info User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldownInfo.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds for info command.

CooldownAdd.label: Add Global Cooldown (seconds)
CooldownAdd.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds for Add level command.

UserCooldownAdd.label: Add User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldownAdd.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds for Add level command.

CooldownList.label: List Global Cooldown (seconds)
CooldownList.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds for List command.

UserCooldownList.label: List User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldownList.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds for List command.

CooldownPosition.label: Position Global Cooldown (seconds)
CooldownPosition.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds for Position command.

UserCooldownPosition.label: Position User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldownPosition.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds for Position command.

CooldownCurrentLevel.label: Current Level Global Cooldown (seconds)
CooldownCurrentLevel.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds for Current Level command.

UserCooldownCurrentLevel.label: Current Level User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldownCurrentLevel.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds for Current Level command.

CooldownNextLevel.label: Next Level Global Cooldown (seconds)
CooldownNextLevel.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds for Next Level command.

UserCooldownNextLevel.label: Next Level User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldownNextLevel.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds for Next Level command.

CooldownWinLevel.label: Win Level Global Cooldown (seconds)
CooldownWinLevel.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds for Win Level command.

UserCooldownWinLevel.label: Win Level User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldownWinLevel.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds for Win Level command.

CooldownSkipLevel.label: Skip Level Global Cooldown (seconds)
CooldownSkipLevel.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds for Skip Level command.

UserCooldownSkipLevel.label: Skip Level User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldownSkipLevel.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds for Skip Level command.

CooldownDeleteLevel.label: Delete Level Global Cooldown (seconds)
CooldownDeleteLevel.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds for Delete Level command.

UserCooldownDeleteLevel.label: Delete Level User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldownDeleteLevel.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds for Delete Level command.

CooldownRefreshOverlay.label: Refresh Overlay Global Cooldown (seconds)
CooldownRefreshOverlay.tooltip: Cooldown in seconds for Refresh Overlay command.

UserCooldownRefreshOverlay.label: Refresh Overlay User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldownRefreshOverlay.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds for Refresh Overlay command.

OnCooldown.value: @{0} the command {1} is still on cooldown for {2} seconds!
OnCooldown.label: Global Cooldown Response
OnCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = command 
 {2} = remaining seconds

OnUserCooldown.value: @{0} the command {1} is still on user cooldown for {2} seconds!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

BtnRestoreAndTranslateResponsesENG.label: Restore default responses (English)
BtnRestoreAndTranslateResponsesENG.tooltip: Restore default responses translated to English (Default)

BtnRestoreAndTranslateResponsesESP.label: Restaura las respuestas por defecto (Español)
BtnRestoreAndTranslateResponsesESP.tooltip: Restaura las respuestas por defecto traducidas al Español

RespInfo.value: {0} <code> (XXX-YYY-ZZZ format, alphanumeric characters excluding I, O) to add a level to queue. {1}, {2}, {3} or {4} for info
RespInfo.label: Info response
RespInfo.tooltip:
Message sent when commands info is required. 
 {0} = add level command 
 {1} = current level command 
 {2} = next level command 
 {3} = list levels command 
 {4} = position command

RespQueueOpened.value: Level queue is now open! Use {0} to add levels to queue
RespQueueOpened.label: Queue opened response
RespQueueOpened.tooltip:
Message sent when queue is open. 
 {0} = add level command

RespQueueClosed.value: Level queue closed! Wait till a mod open the queue again to add your level
RespQueueClosed.label: Queue closed response
RespQueueClosed.tooltip: Message sent when queue is closed

RespLevelAdded.value: @{0} added level {1} to queue on position [{2}]
RespLevelAdded.label: Level added response
RespLevelAdded.tooltip:
Message sent when user adds a level succesfully. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = level code 
 {2} = queue position

RespErrorLevelAdd.value: System error adding level to queue, call a mod
RespErrorLevelAdd.label: Level add error response
RespErrorLevelAdd.tooltip: Message sent when bot fails to add a level to the queue

RespWrongLevelCodeFormat.value: Código de nivel incorrecto, el formato debe coincidir con XXX-YYY-ZZZ, caracteres alfanuméricos sin símbolos ni las letras I, O
RespWrongLevelCodeFormat.label: Wrong level code format error response
RespWrongLevelCodeFormat.tooltip: Message sent when user inputs a wrong formatted level code

RespCurrentLevelRequested.label: Current level response
RespCurrentLevelRequested.tooltip: Message sent when user request current level info

RespNextLevelRequested.label: Next level response on request
RespNextLevelRequested.tooltip: Message sent when user request next level info

RespNoLevelsOnQueue.value: No levels on queue, add yours using {0}
RespNoLevelsOnQueue.label: No levels on queue response
RespNoLevelsOnQueue.tooltip:
Message sent when any command tries to read the queue and it's empty. 
 {0} = add level command

RespErrorReadingQueue.value: Error reading queue file, call a mod
RespErrorReadingQueue.label: Error reading queue file response
RespErrorReadingQueue.tooltip: Message sent when bot fails to read queue file

RespErrorModifyingQueue.value: Error updating queue file, call a mod
RespErrorModifyingQueue.label: Error updating queue file response
RespErrorModifyingQueue.tooltip: Message sent when bot fails to write queue file

RespUserLevelPositions.label: User level positions on queue response
RespUserLevelPositions.tooltip:
Message sent when user invokes !position command. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = positions

RespUserLevelPositionsNoLevels.value: @{0} you have no levels on queue
RespUserLevelPositionsNoLevels.label: User level positions no levels on queue response
RespUserLevelPositionsNoLevels.tooltip:
Message sent when user invokes !position command, but has no levels on queue. 
 {0} = user

RespLevelFinishedWin.label: Part of the level finished response
RespLevelFinishedWin.tooltip: Win level message. Part of the message sent when mods win or skip levels

RespLevelFinishedSkip.label: Part of the level finished response
RespLevelFinishedSkip.tooltip: Skip level message. Part of the message sent when mods win or skip levels

RespLevelFinishedDelete.label: Part of the level finished response
RespLevelFinishedDelete.tooltip: Delete level message. Part of the message sent when mods delete levels from list

RespNextLevel.label: Next level on level finished response
RespNextLevel.tooltip:
Message sent when next level info is required 
 {0} = next level

RespNoMoreLevels.value: No more levels on queue. Add your level using {0}
RespNoMoreLevels.label: No more levels on level finished response
RespNoMoreLevels.tooltip:
Message sent when next level info is required and there are no more levels 
 {0} = add command

RespOverlayUpdated.value: Here we go! Levels Overlay updated
RespOverlayUpdated.label: Overlay updated response
RespOverlayUpdated.tooltip: Message sent when a mod succesfully updates the levels overlay

RespErrorOverlayUpdate.value: Error updating overlay. Call a staff member
RespErrorOverlayUpdate.label: Overlay update error response
RespErrorOverlayUpdate.tooltip: Message sent when the bot fails to update the levels overlay

RespPermissionBase.value: $user -> Only $permissionbase ($permissioninfobase) or higher can use this command
RespPermissionBase.label: Base Permissions denied response
RespPermissionBase.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = permission info

RespPermissionAdvanced.value: $user -> Only $permissionadvanced ($permissioninfoadvanced) or higher can use this command
RespPermissionAdvanced.label: Advanced Permissions denied response
RespPermissionAdvanced.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't select any valid wire. 
{0} = user 
{1} = permission
{2} = permission info

VisitProjectWebsite.label: Visit SMM2LQS Website
VisitProjectWebsite.tooltip: Visit SMM2LQS project website. The GitHub repository

OpenHiroTwitchChannel.label: Visit Hiro Twitch Channel
OpenHiroTwitchChannel.tooltip: Visit Hiro Twitch Channel, one of the creators of SMM2 Level Queue Bot

OpenIsaacWebsite.label: Visit Isaac Website
OpenIsaacWebsite.tooltip: Visit Isaac Website, a.k.a. Hiro, one of the creators of SMM2 Level Queue Bot

OpenGabrielWebsite.label: Visit Gabriel Website
OpenGabrielWebsite.tooltip: Visit Gabriel Rodríguez Website, one of the creators of SMM2 Level Queue Bot

CopyOverlayIndexPath.label: Copy overlay index path
CopyOverlayIndexPath.tooltip: Copy the filepath for index.html directly to clipboard for easy insertion in your streaming software

openReadMe.label: Open README.txt
openReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults. 
 Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
